body: @nhcasual Man props to you for having the sheer dedication to translate this whole series. Most of the time when translators try to do big series they run out of steam like halfway through but not you.

Man I don't know what the author Fukurou is planning, but I do have a prediction based on canon hints. Way back in ch1, it was shown that she started her exhibition fetish to try to please her husband who had exhibition porn on his pc. But ANOTHER thing that was on his pc was anal porn, and she has said she has been practicing anal too offscreen for him. My prediction is that she will have anal sex with some NTR guy as the next step of her fall to madness. And then progress to vaginal for the full path of corruption.
@nhcasual Sensei please teach me how to become a translator
@nhcasual Will there be a penetration in the future update of Nanaka?

@peterstnt I already have begun translating Negoya's stuff on my off time.  I plan to work on Lintfar Story after I finish working on the final untranslated chapters of Charu's story of Mishima Hikaru and Akira. The one where Mishima has a timeskip and gets pregnant.
@nhcasual nice, thanks for the translations, will you be doing other translations in the mean time like negoya's stuff?

This chap opens up the question if she was a virgin or not before she got that dildo shoved into her, but seeing how the author didn't make any drama about her losing her virginity, we just have to assume she has had sex with her husband offscreen.

1 more chap left to translate and then begins the monthly waiting game for the author Fukurou to do his chapters. This month's work will not be Nanaka so it should be July for the next chap of this series.
I know that this is supposed to be no sex but, why didn't he just fucked her?
